flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
プライドが　高く　人から
食べ物を　もらう　ことを　嫌う。
長い　産毛が　寒さを　防ぐ。

Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food
from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.

È molto orgoglioso e odia accettare cibo dalla gente.
Le fitte piume lo proteggono dal freddo.

Es muy orgulloso, por lo que odia aceptar comida de la
gente. Su grueso plumón lo protege del frío.

Es ist sehr stolz und nimmt daher kein Futter von anderen an.
Seine dicken Daunen schützen vor Kälte.

Il est fier et déteste accepter la nourriture qu’on lui offre.
Son pelage épais le protège du froid.

자존심이 강해서 사람에게
먹이를 얻는 것을 싫어한다.
긴 솜털이 추위를 막는다.

プライドが　たかく　ひとから
たべものを　もらう　ことを　きらう。
ながい　うぶげが　さむさを　ふせぐ。

世話を　焼かれる　ことが　大嫌い。
トレーナーの　指示を　聞かないので
仲良く　なるのが　難しい。

It doesn’t like to be taken care of. It’s difficult to
bond with since it won’t listen to its Trainer.

Molto orgoglioso. Difficile farci amicizia perché non ascolta mai
i consigli dell’Allenatore.

No le gusta que lo cuiden. Como no aprecia el apoyo de su
Entrenador, le cuesta coger confianza con él.

Einmischung kann es gar nicht leiden. Es ist bockig und fasst
nur schwer Zutrauen zu seinem Trainer.

Ce Pokémon est difficile à entraîner car il est très désobéissant
et déteste qu’on lui rende service.

신세를 지는 것을 싫어한다.
트레이너의 지시를 듣지 않아
친해지기 어렵다.

せわを　やかれる　ことが　きらい。
トレーナーの　しじを　きかないので
なかよく　なるのが　むずかしい。

長い　産毛が　寒さを　防ぐ。

Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food

Le fitte piume lo proteggono dal freddo.

Es ist sehr stolz und nimmt daher kein Futter von
anderen an. Seine dicken Daunen schützen vor Kälte.

Il est fier et déteste accepter la nourriture qu’on
lui offre. Son pelage épais le protège du froid.

먹이를 얻는 것을 싫어한다.

ながい　うぶげが　さむさを　ふせぐ。

It doesn’t like to be taken care of. It’s difficult to

신세를 지는 것을 싫어한다.
트레이너의 지시를 듣지 않아
친해지기 어렵다.

せわを　やかれる　ことが　きらい。
トレーナーの　しじを　きかないので
なかよく　なるのが　むずかしい。

A poor walker, it often falls down.
However, its strong pride makes it
puff up its chest without a care.

A poor walker, it often falls down.
However, its strong pride makes it
puff up its chest without a care.

A poor walker, it often falls down.
However, its strong pride makes it
puff up its chest without a care.

Malgré sa démarche maladroite et
ses pertes d’équilibre, il bombe
toujours fièrement le torse.

puff up its chest without a care.

toujours fièrement le torse.

of. It’s difficult to bond with since
it won’t listen to its Trainer.

of. It’s difficult to bond with since
it won’t listen to its Trainer.

A poor walker, it often falls down.
However, its strong pride makes it
puff up its chest without a care.

It lives along shores in northern
countries. A skilled swimmer, it
dives for over 10 minutes to hunt.

Because it is very proud, it hates
accepting food from people. Its
thick down guards it from cold.
